New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 50th ODI century, surpassing Sachin Tendulkar's record
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's record-breaking century led India to a total of 4-397
Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs, crushing New Zealand's dreams of World Cup success
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his gratitude and disbelief at breaking Tendulkar's record
India's victory was seen as a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup final
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's win means they are undefeated at this World Cup
The match was played at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium
